arrow-control.description: Whether or not to use arrows for time selection
arrow-control.description_zh: 是否使用箭头进行时间选择

clearable.description: Whether or not to display a clear button

default-value.description: If the selected date value is empty, the default time displayed when the selector panel is opened needs to be set to a value that can be parsed by new Date().
default-value.description_zh: 当选中的日期值为空时，选择器面板打开时默认显示的时间，需设置为可被 new Date() 解析的值

end-placeholder.description: The placeholder content for the end date when the scope is selected
end-placeholder.description_zh: 范围选择时结束日期的占位内容

is-range.description: Whether to select a time range

v-model.description: Date value selected by the date picker to set the initial value of the selector
v-model.description_zh: 日期选择器选中的日期值，可设置选择器的初始值

name.description: 原生 input name 属性
name.description_zh: 原生 input name 属性

picker-options.description: Configure the optional time range and format displayed in the drop-down list
picker-options.description_zh: 配置可选的时间范围、下拉框中显示的格式

placeholder.description_zh: 非范围选择时的占位内容

popper-append-to-body.description: Whether to insert a popup into the body element, if there is a problem with the positioning of the popup, you can set this property to false
popper-append-to-body.description_zh: 是否将弹出框插入至 body 元素，在弹出框的定位出现问题时，可将该属性设置为 false

popper-class.description: TimePicker 下拉框的 class 类名
popper-class.description_zh: TimePicker 下拉框的 class 类名

size.description: Enter the size of the field

start-placeholder.description: The placeholder content for the start date when the range is selected
start-placeholder.description_zh: 范围选择时开始日期的占位内容

step.description: Customize the time, minute, and second steps

:suffix-icon.description: Customize the class name of the head icon
:suffix-icon.description_zh: 自定义头部图标的类名

events.name: blur
events.description_zh: 当 input 失去焦点时触发

events.name: change
events.description: Triggered when the user confirms the selected value
events.description_zh: 用户确认选定的值时触发

events.name: focus
events.description_zh: 当 input 获得焦点时触发
